data.introduce: 国内变更费存储（订单）（AirReIssuePriceIntoPnrOrder）为用户提供了查询国内自动退改签录入TRR信息功能的服务。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirReIssuePriceIntoPnrOrderRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"国内退改签录入PNR（订单）","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"office号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"ReIssueFareInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退改签信息","children":[{"name":"Psgindex","type":"int","quantity":"1","description":"代表旅客序号，在PNR 只有一个旅客的时候可以忽略","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"SerialNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"serialNo 为查询TRR 运价的返回结果获得","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"Fareindex","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退改签费序号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"客户姓名","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"svc_EMD","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"svc_EMD","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"DeleteSegsNos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"要删除的航段序列","children":[{"name":"deleteSegsNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航段序列号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..2","description":"PNR号或订单号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"值：PNR号或订单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"类型：PNR或ORDER","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}]
